media:group.media:title: Authorization at Netflix Scale
media:group.media:description:
QCon Plus, the online software development conference organized by InfoQ, is returning this November 30 - December 8, with an international community of senior software engineers, architects, and team leaders joining. Don’t miss your chance to be part of this event!

Save your spot now: https://bit.ly/3RvbhpN 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Video with transcript included:  https://bit.ly/3QkocKE   

Travis Nelson discusses Netflix’s approach to scaling and shares techniques for distributed caching and isolating failure domains.

This presentation was recorded at QCon Plus November 2021: https://plus.qconferences.com/ 

#Netflix #Scalability #security
